linkMap: Open map in a new window
reservationReminderText:
You will receive a reminder email of your bookings.

You can also find them on My Bookings page.
reservationReminderTextHandling:
You will receive a booking confirmation by email when we have processed your booking.

You can also find them on My Bookings page.
reservationNotPossible: Unfortunately, the item cannot be booked at the selected time. Please select a different time.
loadReservationCalendar: Download a reminder to your calendar <calendarLink>here</calendarLink>.
reservationInfo1-1: You can make bookings <bold>between {{reservationsMaxDaysBefore}} {{unit}}</bold> and <bold>{{reservationsMinDaysBefore}} days in advance</bold>.
reservationInfo1-2: You can make bookings <bold> {{reservationsMaxDaysBefore}} {{unit}} in advance</bold>.
reservationInfo1-3: You can make bookings <bold>{{reservationsMinDaysBefore}} days in advance</bold>.
reservationInfo2-2: <bold>This item will be available until {{date}} at {{time}}</bold>.
reservationInfo2-3: <bold>Booking of this item has ended {{date}} at {{time}}</bold>.
reservationInfo3: The duration of the booking should be between <bold>{{minReservationDuration}}</bold> â€“ <bold>{{maxReservationDuration}}</bold>.
reservationInfo4_one: You can have <bold>up to one booking at a time</bold>.
reservationInfo4_other: You can have <bold>up to {{count}} bookings at a time</bold>.
futurePricingNotice: <bold>The price will change on {{date}}. The new price is {{price}}</bold>.

notifications.notReservable: This item is not available for booking at the moment.
notifications.futureOpening: You can make bookings for this item starting on {{date}}.
